Title: Care of Footpath 2
Writer: Shrikanth H.R. (dialogue), Shrikanth H.R. (screenplay), S.S. Kishan, Shyam Prasad (dialogue)
Actors: S.S. Kishan, Avika Gor, Esha Deol, J. Karthik
Plot: An emotional suspense thriller inspired by true stories of juvenile delinquents in the India. Four teenage friends are provoked to plan and execute the murder of a cop.
